tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CrimeData (
    crime_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    crime_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    crime_date DATE NOT NULL,
    crime_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    crime_description TEXT,
    report_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE suspects (
    suspect_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    suspect_name VARCHAR(255),
    suspect_age INT,
    crime_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (crime_id) REFERENCES crimes(crime_id)
);

CREATE TABLE crimes (
    crime_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crime_type VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    date TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE suspects (
    suspect_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    address VARCHAR(255),
    occupation VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE investigations (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crime_id INT,
    suspect_id INT,
    officer VARCHAR(255),
    status VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE crimes (
  crime_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  crime_type VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  date DATE,
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE suspects (
  suspect_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE crime_reports (
  report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  crime_id INT,
  suspect_id INT,
  agent_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE CrimeReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  crime_type VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Suspects (
  suspect_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  address VARCHAR(100),
  gender CHAR(1)
)

CREATE TABLE VictimReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  victim_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  crime_type VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  statement TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Witnesses (
  witness_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  contact_info VARCHAR(100),
  statement TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE LawEnforcement (
  officer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  officer_name VARCHAR(50),
  badge_number INT,
  department VARCHAR(50),
  rank VARCHAR(20)
)
